Interface FullDepositFee

Represents the full deposit fee containing fees for both L1 and L2 transactions.

interface FullDepositFee {
    baseCost: bigint;
    gasPrice?: bigint;
    l1GasLimit: bigint;
    l2GasLimit: bigint;
    maxFeePerGas?: bigint;
    maxPriorityFeePerGas?: bigint;
}
